definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: An experimental study on the gouge along Xiaojiang fault has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 对小江断裂带的断层泥进行了实验研究。

sentences.english: The northeastward Xiangshui fault zone in this area is the main rock-control and ore-control structure.
sentences.chinese: 区内北东向响水断裂带是主要的控岩和控矿构造。

sentences.english: Lingbei main fracture zone mostly played an ore conducting role in the process.
sentences.chinese: 灵北主断裂带则主要扮演了一种导矿构造的作用。

sentences.english: It is a correct argument that Huayingshan fault zone is a fundamental fault.
sentences.chinese: 推断华蓥山断裂带系基底断裂的论点是正确的。

sentences.english: Yueliangshan fault is the east segment of Haiyuan fault zone.
sentences.chinese: 月亮山东麓断裂位于海原断裂带的东段。

sentences.english: The observation data of mobile geo-magnetism along Xianshuihe faults for 10 years are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对鲜水河断裂带10多年的磁力观测资料进行处理。

sentences.english: Altun south margin fracture is a regional deep-rooted fracture reaching upper mantle, along which there are plenty of basic-ultrabasic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔金南缘断裂带是一条深达上地幔的区域性大断裂。

sentences.english: The fault dynamo-thermal metamorphic belts are limited within the Lianhua-shan fault zone.
sentences.chinese: 莲花山断裂带是一条多期变形变质带。

sentences.english: Fractured zone has a crudity surface with a pitch.
sentences.chinese: 断裂带表面粗糙，并带有斜度。

sentences.english: Currently the Hongche fault belt in the north-central segment of footwall fault has been found.
sentences.chinese: 目前在红车断裂带中北段断裂带下盘已发现。

sentences.english: Currently the Hongche fault belt in the north-central segment of footwall fault has been found.
sentences.chinese: 目前在红车断裂带中北段断裂带下盘已发现。

sentences.english: Higher gravity values and thinner crust can be found at the axial localities of the fault zone.
sentences.chinese: 在该断裂带存在着轴部重力高与地壳减薄。

sentences.english: The southern end of this rift includes the Franklin Mountains near El Paso.
sentences.chinese: 断裂带的南端包含了埃尔帕索附近的富兰克林山系。

sentences.english: Both of them were offset by large-sized sinistral move of the Tanlou fault in Mesozoic.
sentences.chinese: 郯庐断裂带中生代大规模左行平移使两者错开。

sentences.english: Erlangmiao fracture belt is the only fracture structure to connect Houba oil sands.
sentences.chinese: 二郎庙断裂带是邻接厚坝油砂岩的唯一断裂构造。

sentences.english: The research indicates that the Wuchuan Sihui fault is a crust cutting deep fault.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，吴川四会断裂带是一条切壳深断裂。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
reverse fault (geology)/compression fault, where one block pushes over the other at dip of less than 45 degrees
